page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW OF THE AREA
page.content: The area contained within the block all lies in the Metropolitan Borough of Sandwell, in the conurbation of the West Midlands. The local name given to the area is the Black Country, originating from the early iron and steel industries of the region. The area now contains a mixture of functions including industrial, residential, commercial and recreational. The M5 motorway passes through the eastern part of the block providing communications via the national motorway network to most of Britain's large Urban areas.
